General_Description: '''The Son Who Faced the Sun''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''I am standing tall with my ten brothers. We surround our mighty father, [[Poseidon]]. Silent. Watchful. With a waterfall at my back, I have the most glorious view of [[Helios]] retiring his flaming [[chariot]] for the night.''
Section_Trivia: *The riddle references the sons of Poseidon, mentioned by [[Plato]] in his ''{{Wiki|Critias (dialogue)|Critias}}'' as the kings of [[Atlantis]].
